tool_description: Api shows the latest cricket news all around the world
name: Cricket-News-Api
title: Cricket-News-Api

api_list.name: Get Individual Cricket News source News
api_list.description: Get Latest cricket news from a specific news resources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cricket-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/cricnews/cricbuzz"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricket-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cricket-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/cricnews/{cricnewspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cricket-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Cricket News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all cricket news from all over the world.
